sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import {fetchLoggedInUserOrderAsync} from '../../redux/userSlice'; import { Grid } from 'react-loader-spinner'; export default function UserOrders() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orders = useSelector((state)=>state?.user?.userInfo?.orders)||[]; console.log(orders,"ordersmap") const status = useSelector((state) => state.user.status); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchLoggedInUserOrderAsync()); }, [dispatch]); return (
{orders && orders.map((order) => (

Order # {order.id}

Order Status : {order.status}

    {order.items.map((item) => (

  • {item.product.title}

    ${item.product.discountPrice}

    {item.product.brand}

    • ))}

Subtotal

$ {order.totalAmount}

Total Items in Cart

{order.totalItems} items

Shipping Address :

{order.selectedAddress.name}

{order.selectedAddress.street}

{order.selectedAddress.pinCode}

Phone: {order.selectedAddress.phone}

{order.selectedAddress.city}

))} {status === 'loading' ? ( ) : null}
) };
